oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio II : Programme de recherche en agriculture biologique
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Agribio II program is a major program for organic farming research in the 2004-2007 period. Several organic farming projects are funded under this program, which are being carried out by INRA, by INRA-ACTA collaboration or by INRA-ACTA-ACTIA collaboration. Most of the projects concerns Crop husbandry, but also projects in the areas of farming system, animal husbandry, environmental aspects and Food systems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Programme} Agribio II : Programme de recherche en agriculture biologique. [Agribio II : Research program in organic farming.] Runs 2004 - 2007.
